code: @Test public void testBeanRoutes() throws Exception {     AbstractXmlApplicationContext applicationContext = createApplicationContext().     CamelContext camelContext = SpringCamelContext.springCamelContext(applicationContext, true).     // START SNIPPET: invoke     ISay proxy = applicationContext.getBean("sayProxy", ISay.class).     String rc = proxy.say().     assertEquals("Hello", rc).     // END SNIPPET: invoke     camelContext.stop().     IOHelper.close(applicationContext). }
